### Create Matrix with R
```{r}
mat1 <- matrix(1:4, nrow = 3, ncol = 4) 
mat2 <- matrix(1:5, nrow = 3, ncol = 4)
mat1
mat2
#indexing in matrix
mat1[1,2]
#Matrix arithmetic
mat1 + mat2
```
